state.motivation: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

currentAffairs.title: India Issues First National Lung Cancer Care Guidelines
currentAffairs.summary: India has released its first nationally developed, evidence-based lung cancer care guidelines to standardize cancer treatment.

currentAffairs.title: Elon Musk Becomes World's First $800 Billion Individual
currentAffairs.summary: Elon Musk's net worth has crossed USD 800 billion, making him the first individual to reach this milestone.

currentAffairs.title: India-China Trade Reaches Record USD 155 Billion
currentAffairs.summary: Bilateral trade between India and China reached a historic high in 2025, reflecting a stabilization of ties.

currentAffairs.title: World Government Summit 2026 Opens in Dubai
currentAffairs.summary: The World Government Summit 2026, centered around 'Shaping Future Governments,' commenced in Dubai, gathering global leaders to discuss innovation and sustainability.

currentAffairs.title: DRDO Successfully Demonstrates SFDR Missile Technology
currentAffairs.summary: The Defence Research & Development Organisation (DRDO) successfully demonstrated Solid Fuel Ducted Ramjet (SFDR) technology, marking a milestone in advanced missile propulsion.

currentAffairs.title: Indian Railways Launches First LNGâ€“Diesel Dual-Fuel DEMU Train in Ahmedabad
currentAffairs.summary: Indian Railways has launched its first LNG-Diesel dual-fuel DEMU train in Ahmedabad.
